jobListings.aboutCompany: Tech Innovators Ltd is a leading technology company specializing in innovative solutions for businesses globally. Our team is passionate about pushing the boundaries of technology to create cutting-edge products.
jobListings.aboutRole: As a Software Engineer at Tech Innovators Ltd, you will be responsible for developing high-quality software solutions, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and contributing to the overall success of our projects.
skills: 5+ years of experience in software development
responsibilities: Collaborate with product managers to define project specifications

jobListings.aboutCompany: Data Solutions Ltd is a data-driven company dedicated to providing advanced analytics and insights to businesses. Our team comprises talented individuals passionate about harnessing the power of data to drive informed decision-making.
jobListings.aboutRole: Join our team as a Data Scientist, where you will work on complex data sets, build predictive models, and contribute to the development of data-driven strategies for our clients.
skills: Master's degree in Data Science or related field
Proficiency in Python and data manipulation libraries
responsibilities: Analyze and interpret complex data sets
Build predictive models and machine learning algorithms
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver data-driven solutions

jobListings.aboutCompany: CodeCrafters Inc is a dynamic tech startup that focuses on creating elegant and user-friendly web applications. We are a team of passionate developers and designers committed to delivering exceptional digital experiences.
jobListings.aboutRole: We are seeking a talented Frontend Developer to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for crafting visually appealing and intuitive user interfaces, collaborating with UX designers, and implementing frontend features.
skills: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Experience with frontend frameworks such as React or Angular
responsibilities: Implement responsive and interactive user interfaces
Collaborate with backend developers to integrate frontend components

jobListings.aboutCompany: CyberGuard Solutions is a leading cybersecurity firm that specializes in protecting businesses from digital threats. Our team of experts is dedicated to staying ahead of cyber threats and providing cutting-edge security solutions.
jobListings.aboutRole: Join our cybersecurity team as an Analyst, where you will play a crucial role in identifying and mitigating security risks, conducting vulnerability assessments, and ensuring the overall security of our clients' systems.
skills: Bachelor's degree in Cybersecurity or related field
Experience in threat detection and incident response
Certifications such as CISSP or CISM
responsibilities: Conduct security assessments and vulnerability scans
Collaborate with IT teams to implement security measures
niceToHave: Experience with security information and event management (SIEM) tools

jobListings.aboutCompany: AI Innovations is a cutting-edge technology company that focuses on developing innovative artificial intelligence solutions. Our team is composed of talented individuals who are passionate about pushing the boundaries of AI.
jobListings.aboutRole: As a Machine Learning Engineer, you will be at the forefront of developing and implementing machine learning models, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and contributing to the advancement of AI technologies.
skills: Master's degree in Computer Science or related field
Experience in machine learning model development
Proficiency in Python and machine learning frameworks
responsibilities: Develop and implement machine learning models
Collaborate with data scientists to preprocess and analyze data
Optimize and fine-tune machine learning models
niceToHave: Knowledge of deep learning frameworks such as TensorFlow or PyTorch

jobListings.aboutCompany: CloudBuilders Tech is a leading provider of cloud solutions, specializing in helping businesses migrate to and optimize their operations in the cloud. Our team of experts is dedicated to delivering scalable and reliable cloud architectures.
jobListings.aboutRole: Join our team as a Cloud Solutions Architect, where you will be responsible for designing and implementing cloud infrastructure, providing technical guidance to clients, and ensuring the successful deployment of cloud solutions.
skills: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
Experience in cloud architecture and design
Certifications such as AWS Certified Solutions Architect
responsibilities: Design and implement scalable and secure cloud architectures
Provide technical expertise and guidance to clients
Collaborate with development teams to deploy applications in the cloud
niceToHave: Experience with containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes)

jobListings.aboutCompany: PEAS develops autonomous technology solutions for emerging economies by leveraging the power of artificial intelligence and machine learning.
jobListings.aboutRole: We seek a Machine Learning Engineer to join our product team. You will develop ML models and algorithms for use in our products, from prototyping to production deployment.

jobListings.aboutCompany: Farmer's Choice is East Africa's leading agricultural commodities supplier, connecting thousands of farmers to global markets. Our operations span food processing, logistics, exports and trade financing across the region.
jobListings.aboutRole: We are looking for a data-savvy analyst to derive insights from our supply chain datasets that could improve outcomes for all stakeholders. The role is heavily cross-functional, requiring good communication skills.

jobListings.aboutCompany: RIIDE operates Tanzania's leading ride-sharing app, connecting thousands of drivers with riders everyday across Tanzania. Our engineering team builds performant mobile apps scaled for emerging market environments.
jobListings.aboutRole: As an Android Developer, you will own development of new features for our rider and driver apps used everyday across Dar es Salaam. Expect plenty of complexity and scale challenges to solve.

jobListings.aboutCompany: DigiShop is Uganda's #1 B2C ecommerce company, operating Jumia's core portfolio of consumer shopping apps tailored specifically for the Ugandan market.
jobListings.aboutRole: As an iOS Developer, you will craft bespoke iOS apps interfaces for DigiShop's customers shopping on iPhones and iPads. Get ready to deliver buttery smooth ecommerce experiences specifically for Ugandan users.

jobListings.aboutCompany: FarmFresh operates a digital platform connecting farmers directly to retailers, optimizing fresh food supply chains using technology.
jobListings.aboutRole: As a product manager at FarmFresh, you will be at the epicenter of solving supply chain inefficiencies in the food ecosystem.
responsibilities: Plan product features based on research

jobListings.aboutCompany: SafeMoto builds IoT and mobile solutions for motorcycle ride-hailing fleets to improve safety and access across Kampala and major Ugandan cities.
jobListings.aboutRole: We are seeking an entrepreneurial engineering manager to lead a team building innovative safety products tailored specifically for Ugandan motorcycle taxi networks.

jobListings.aboutCompany: Nzuri Jobs operates Rwanda's largest online jobs portal, connecting talented candidates with employers across every industry.
jobListings.aboutRole: We are looking for a Full Stack Developer to build new features for our platform leveraged by 100,000+ monthly active job seekers in Rwanda.

jobListings.aboutCompany: SmartFarm builds sensors, analytics software, and intelligence tools to help farmers across Africa maximize crop yields sustainably using precision agriculture techniques.
jobListings.aboutRole: As a Cloud Architect, you will own design and implementation of highly reliable and scalable infrastructure for massive sensor data pipelines analyzed by our machine learning models to deliver insights to farmers.

jobListings.aboutCompany: Wakulima Market builds digital services for retail vendors across informal settlements in Kenya to help them manage procurement, financing, and inventory digitally.
jobListings.aboutRole: As a Platform Engineer, you will build APIs and services used daily by tens of thousands of small business owners across Nairobi to streamline and improve their operations.

jobListings.aboutCompany: FarmTasks provides agricultural drone services and aerial intelligence to commercial farms across Uganda to help monitor crop health, track issues, and improve planning using geospatial data.
jobListings.aboutRole: As a Backend Engineer, you will build services to manage massive drone imagery datasets and extract insights for farmers to digest easily through our mobile applications.

jobListings.aboutCompany: EasyMatatu operates mass transit booking platforms, payment systems, and bus management tools to connect commuters across Nairobi with reliable, affordable transport operators.
jobListings.aboutRole: We are looking for a Senior Android Developer to lead builds for our daily active rider applications used by over 500K Nairobians to book, pay and rate matatus across the city.

jobListings.aboutCompany: RedGreen builds customized agricultural equipment for smallholder farmers to improve productivity and reduce waste with technology tailored for African usage conditions.
jobListings.aboutRole: As an Embedded Systems Engineer, you will develop firmware and embedded software to control sensors, motors, and other integrated devices within custom farming equipment used widely across Rwanda.

jobListings.aboutCompany: BRCK builds rugged wifi routers, secure tablets, modular cell and sensor towers, and other connectivity infrastructure tailored for reliability in harsh emerging market environments.
jobListings.aboutRole: As a Firmware Engineer at BRCK, you will help develop firmware for a range of communication, battery, sensor, and storage devices specifically designed for reliability, safety, usability and affordability across Africa.

jobListings.aboutCompany: AgriTech builds machine learning solutions for commercial farms to optimize operations, reduce waste, and improve crop yield predictions using agricultural data analytics.
jobListings.aboutRole: We are seeking a Data Scientist to help create value from agricultural datasets. You will develop predictive models and data experiments to derive actionable insights for commercial farm clients across Uganda.
responsibilities: Build ML models to power products

jobListings.aboutCompany: SafeBikes operates an innovative IoT + bike-sharing platform making cycling safe, fun and affordable across Dar es Salaam through smart bikes and docks powered by technology.
jobListings.aboutRole: We are looking for an experienced Tech Lead Engineer to own architecture and lead back end design for the technology enabling 10,000+ daily bike rides across Tanzania's commercial capital.

jobListings.aboutCompany: FarmLink develops farmer-centered software, fintech tools, and digitized supply chain systems for agricultural enterprises across Africa to promote efficiency and food security.
jobListings.aboutRole: We are seeking an Internal Tools Engineer to customize and enhance operations tools tailored for the needs of our coworkers, partners and internal systems. Creativity and collaboration skills are key in this role.

jobListings.aboutCompany: Ampion is a venture capital fund backing early stage financial technology innovators solving pressing problems in Africa through creative apps of blockchain, decentralized finance and embedded fintech.
jobListings.aboutRole: We are seeking an Investment Partner to identify promising early stage fintech opportunities across the continent, conduct diligence and support portfolio companies through value-add guidance.

jobListings.aboutCompany: FarmerCentric builds human-centered tools for value chain players in developing agriculture markets to fix systems-level problems through thoughtful design.
jobListings.aboutRole: We are looking for an exceptional UX/UI Designer to create intuitive digital experiences for agricultural stakeholders across Rwanda. This role requires deep user and client empathy to craft effective solutions.

jobListings.aboutCompany: DATA AFRICA is an AI for social good startup leveraging satellite, drone and ground sensor data to provide vital infrastructure insights for public sector planning across West Africa. Our datasets curate geospatial intelligence to guide economic development.
jobListings.aboutRole: We seek a talented Data Engineer to help build a platform making Africa's earth observation data accessible, understandable and actionable for sustainability initiatives.

jobListings.aboutCompany: WasteCo develops smart waste collection tools and integrated city sanitation systems to tackle unmanaged waste across rapidly expanding West African cities using technology for social impact..
jobListings.aboutRole: We are seeking a Platform Engineer to architect well-designed services powering transparent waste collection across Accra and streamlining relationships between households, waste collectors and the local government.
responsibilities: Design and build core platform APIs

jobListings.aboutCompany: Kilimo Grow builds digital farmer services specializing in connecting smallholder farmers across Rwanda to reliable markets, affordable inputs and global best practices for sustainable livelihoods.
jobListings.aboutRole: We seek an experienced Full-stack Engineer to build apps enhancing market access for thousands of farmers across Rwanda. This role combines critical thinking with coding skills tailored for emerging agricultural ecosystems.

jobListings.aboutCompany: SafeKababa builds fleet management tools for motorcycle taxi operators in Kampala using mobile phones, IoT and real-time data analytics to promote driver welfare, safety and transparency.
jobListings.aboutRole: We are seeking an entrepreneurial VP Engineering to build a world-class team that moves fast and builds robust technology tailored for motorcycle taxi networks serving millions in Kampala daily.

jobListings.aboutCompany: Farmer's Choice is East Africa's leading agricultural commodities supplier, connecting thousands of farmers to global markets. Our operations span food processing, logistics, exports and trade financing across the region.
jobListings.aboutRole: We are embarking on an enterprise-wide digital transformation initiative to build supply chain visibility, improve operations, reduce costs and enable new services through targeted adoption of disruptive and sustainable technology across the agribusiness.
